title: Relonage
author: Relonage
content: Per Coinglass data, Grayscale's current total holdings are valued at around $23.592 billion. Notably, the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust Fund (GBTC) sports a discount of 18.97%, while the ETH Trust stands at a 25.26% discount. Additionally, the ETC Trust boasts a 48.20% discount, with the LTC Trust following at a 15.60% discount.
